Package seemlmot

Class TaskList

java.lang.Object
seemlmot.TaskList
public class TaskList extends Object
Manages the list of tasks for the Seemlmot chatbot. Provides functionality to add, delete, mark, and search for tasks.

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskList

      public TaskList()

  • Method Details

    • addTask

      public static void addTask(String currentDescription, String type, boolean isTerminalCmd)
      Adds a new task to the list based on user input and task type. Supports ToDo (T), Deadline (D), and Event (E) types.
      Parameters:
      currentDescription - The full raw command string from the user.
      type - The type of task to add ("T", "D", or "E").
      isTerminalCmd - True if the operation should print feedback to the console.
      Throws:
      SeemlmotException - If description is missing or date/time format is invalid.

    • list

      public static void list(String currentDescription)
      Displays all tasks currently in the list to the user.
      Parameters:
      currentDescription - The command string, expected to be just "list".
      Throws:
      SeemlmotException - If extra arguments are provided after "list".

    • mark

      public static void mark(int index, boolean markAsDone)
      Marks a specific task as done or undone.
      Parameters:
      index - The 0-based index of the task in the list.
      markAsDone - True to mark as done, false to mark as undone.
      Throws:
      SeemlmotException - If the provided index is out of bounds.

    • deleteTask

      public static void deleteTask(int index)
      Removes a task from the list at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The 0-based index of the task to be deleted.
      Throws:
      SeemlmotException - If the index is invalid.

    • findTask

      public static void findTask(String currentDescription)
      Searches for tasks whose descriptions contain the specified keyword. The search is case-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      currentDescription - The raw search command containing the keyword.
      Throws:
      SeemlmotException - If the keyword is missing.

    • getCmdList

      public static ArrayList<Task> getCmdList()
      Returns the current internal task list.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Task objects.

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(ArrayList<Task> dataList)
      Initializes the task list with existing data, usually from a file.
      Parameters:
      dataList - The ArrayList of tasks to load.
